alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 6:11PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Beaverhead County through 645 PM MDT... At 611 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Dillon, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Beaverhead County. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 67 and 78 . MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
